Articles.Content:
Knock out Mission Control using an asteroid, aimed from LKO.

Easy: Class A or B

Normal: Class C

Hard: Class D

Manley: Class E - aimed from at least 350k altitude

Remember: Pics or it didn't happen!

EDIT by request:

Rules:

- It doesn't matter how you get your asteroid into a stable LKO - that's not the interesting part. Anybody can get a class E into LKO legitly so hyperedit it there if you wish.

- From there on: Only vanilla parts or parts from the usual well-balanced mods (KW etc.)

- No overpowered cheat-parts, no Alt-F12

- Mods that provide flight info are allowed

Scoring:

- Asteroid class x 10

- Direct hit doubles score

- The use of mods that predict the impact location quarters the score

- Other buildings than Mission Control don't count

Remember: At the end of the day you can't buy anything for your score - it's the bragging rights you earn.
